servinfo.title: Clutch Operating Cylinder Assembly Removal and Installation

item.ptxt: Do not allow fluid to get on painted surfaces. It may cause painted surface damage.
Do not disassemble clutch operating cylinder assembly.

s1.ptxt: Clean around reservoir cap of brake master cylinder and take out fluid with syringe or such.

Dismount transmission assembly referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Petrol Engine Model or Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Diesel Engine Model .
Loosen clutch fluid pipe flare nut (1) of clutch operating cylinder assembly (2).
Remove clutch pipe joint sleeve (3) from transmission front case and then remove clutch fluid pipe (4).
Remove clutch operating cylinder assembly from transmission front case.
Install clutch operating cylinder assembly (2) to transmission front case. Tighten mounting bolts to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Clutch operating cylinder assembly mounting bolt

s1.ptxt: Connect clutch fluid pipe (4) to clutch operating cylinder assembly temporarily.
Install clutch pipe joint sleeve (3) to transmission front case securely and then tighten clutch fluid pipe flare nut (1) to specified torque.
Remount transmission assembly referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Petrol Engine Model or Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Diesel Engine Model .
Fill reservoir with specified brake fluid and check for fluid leakage.
Bleed air from system and check clutch pedal free travel. Refer to Clutch Pedal Free Travel Check and Air Bleeding of Brake System for air bleeding procedure.
